unittitle_ssm: Edward Weed letter to Frederic Ayers
abstract_ssm: One 1845 letter from Reverend Edward Weed, pastor of the First Free Presbyterian Church in Brooklyn, N.Y., to Reverend Frederic Ayers of Stamford, CT, giving the dates of his visit to Stamford and his probable time of arrival.
